RULES
modified rules of marquis and the bulge


general
  1. the site-wide rules, as always, apply.
  2. if you have a question, you can always PM me. if asking in-thread, preface the message with @mod so i do not miss it.
  3. do not talk about this ongoing game outside this thread, except for in private mod-given PTs.
  4. this is a game. have fun. play to win. don't be a jerk.

posting and voting
  1. times new roman is my mod font and #BF0000 is my mod colour. do not use them or impersonate me otherwise.
  2. do not use hidden or encrypted text (tiny, invisible, other-language) or provable randomization (dice tags).
  3. all votes must be in bold or use the VOTE: Player tag. unvotes are not necessary, but helpful.
  4. to insure your vote is seen, please put it on its own line. this is not mandatory, but if i miss a vote because of this, it is on you!
  5. votes may not be contained inside quote, area, code or spoiler tags.
  6. nicknames and shortened names may be used when voting, but it must be clear who it is being voted for. do not use trick votes.
  7. a lynch is achieved when the majority of players are voting a person. if majority is not reached by deadline, a no lynch occurs.

activity and deadlines
  1. failure to post with in 48 hours will result in a prod. if you do not post within 24 hours or if it is your third prod, you will be replaced.
  2. if you will be V/LA, please post so, bolded, in-thread
  3. day phase will last 2 weeks (14 days) and night phase will last 48 hours
  4. if you share a PT with another player, you may request that player be poked (not an official prod)
  5. a missed night action will result in a no action

vanilla townie role pm:

welcome to mini 1674: a minimalist text adventure.

you are a vanilla townie.

you have no special abilities.

you win when all threats to the town are dead.

the game thread is here: game thread. please confirm via PM by stating your role name.

the storyteller is #hyped.

roles are being randomized now and role PMs will go out in the next hour [ASAP]. game will start when 11/13 confirm.

all role PMs have been sent!

EDIT: ... it has come to my attention that I got the game number wrong. let's just pretend that never happened.

with everyone confirmed, day 1 beings...

snap... crackle... pop...

the fire is roaring.
